amendment.description: To provide that certain claims of Senators and Senate officers and employees are received and approved by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3665 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3665 proposed by Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR S9423; text: CR S9423) To provide that certain claims of Senators and Senate officers and employees are received and approved by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3665 proposed by Senator Campbell.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3665 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
